title: Taboomenu问题
author: cp666
txt_content:
在使用taboomenu卖东西时，就算点券不足也能买，足够是扣除点券怎么让他不足的时候提示

yml格式：
6:
  id: head:3
  skull-texture:
    id: fc6f2ea4-543e-477f-98db-02c0f5
    texture: eyJ0ZXh0dXJlcyI6eyJTS0lOIjp7InVybCI6Imh0dHA6Ly90ZXh0dXJlcy5taW5lY3JhZnQubmV0L3RleHR1cmUvNDFmODRiOWIxYjhlNDBiNmVkNTliOWQxMTM4YTdlZjQ1YTc0NjgwN2U0MmIxMDM1MmM3MzBhYmJkZDE5MGNiMyJ9fX0=
  name: '&c暗海钱袋'
  lore:
    - ''
    - ' &a详情:'
    - '&f  &9极为沉重的钱袋，内含'
    - '&f  &640000 - 80000 金币'
    - ''
    - '&f&m                       '
    - '&7价格: &65000点券 / 个'
  command:  
    - 'take-points: 5000'
    - 'tell: &e小娜&7>> &f已扣除5000点券'
    - 'broadcast: &e小娜&7>> &f恭喜玩家 &4%player_name% &f购买了 &c暗海钱袋'
    - 'console: mp give %player_name% 6 1'

replies.author: xmdhs
replies.txt_content:
2:
  id: diamond
  # 点击所需点卷（需要 PlayerPoints 插件）
  points: 100复制代码

replies.author: cp666
replies.txt_content:
